alert.note: Alert for Breathitt; Lee; Morgan; Powell; Wolfe (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 12:39PM EDT until June 17 at 1:15PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in JACKSON KY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Powell County in east central Kentucky... Southwestern Morgan County in southeastern Kentucky... Northwestern Breathitt County in southeastern Kentucky... Northeastern Lee County in southeastern Kentucky... Wolfe County in southeastern Kentucky... * Until 115 PM EDT. * At 1239 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over High Falls, or near Campton, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Vortex around 1245 PM EDT. Baptist around 1250 PM EDT. Lexie around 1255 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Upper Gilmore, Belknap and Burg. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
